item.title: Countries: Gotta catch 'em all
item.description: Created with mapchart.net As an avid motorcycle enthusiast, I’ve had the privilege of riding through various landscapes, each offering its unique charm. Here’s a glimpse of my journey through eight countries, each experienced from the perspective of my trusty MT09 and T7. Belgium: An Urban Ride (MT09) My ride through Belgium felt like a continuous drive through a bustling city. Perhaps I missed a turn somewhere but it was quite the urban experience.
